sent.orig: If the name is not right then speech will not be in order, and if speech is not in order then nothing will be accomplished.
sent.trans: 名不正则言不顺，言不顺则事不成！

sent.orig: To record, press these two buttons together; then rewind, and then press the red button to play back.
sent.trans: 要录音就得一起按下这两个键，而后倒回，按下这个红键播放。

sent.orig: "If only I had known you then," he said wistfully.
sent.trans: “要是我那时候认识你就好了，”他伤感地说。

sent.orig: "Let's go the whole animal then, " said Sam.
sent.trans: 山姆说“那咱们就干到底吧。”

sent.orig: A bird had snatched up the snake from the ground and then dropped it on to the wires.
sent.trans: 一只鸟从地上抓起了这条蛇，后来不小心把它丢到电线上了。
